SELECT t2.id, t2.title, t2.type, t3.nickname publisherName, t2.publish_time, t1.is_read, t2.level FROM sys_user_notice t1 INNER JOIN sys_notice t2 ON t1.notice_id = t2.id AND t2.publish_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t2.publisher_id = t3.id WHERE t1.user_id = #{queryParams.userId} AND t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0
AND t2.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.title},'%')
ORDER BY t2.publish_time DESC, t2.create_time DESC
